name: Bug Attack!
description: Bug Attack! is a game inspired by arcade classics including Missile Command and Space Invaders. Players are tasked with protecting their building as long as they can. Bugs emerge everywhere from the ground at an increasing rate. Which is the greater enemy? The bug horde, or your own nerves?
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: 1 Ghz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: WebGL accelerated card Storage: 180 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: 2 Ghz dual-core Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB graphics card with Open GL 2.0+ Support Storage: 180 MB available space
